
#update registrar public name field#

Transaction: registrarupdate
Action_ID: test_1026102 
Registrarpub_Name: updated_public_contact


#update URL#

Transaction: registrarupdate
Action_ID: test_1026102 
url: http://www.site.com


#update all available fields#

Transaction: RegistrarUpdate
Action_ID: test_1026102 
url: http://www.test.com
Registrarpub_Name: updated_public_contact
Registrarpub_Address1: address1
Registrarpub_Address2: address2
Registrarpub_Country: NZ
Registrarpub_City: wgtn
Registrarpub_Email: test@test.co.nz
Registrarpub_phone: +64-4-123-4567
Registrarpub_fax: +64-4-1234567
registrarpub_postalcode: 123
Registrarsrs_Name: srsname

defaulttech_Country: NZ

Note: Contact registry to update 2LD's, public key, the access role list, the Registrar Name, and the Registrar Accounting Reference
